title: Surface Laptop Go 2: Price, release date, and everything we expect
content:
Microsoft’s Surface family includes some of the most iconic premium laptops on the market. From the original Surface Pro to the most recent form factors like the Surface Laptop Studio, the company has always made very interesting devices. In the past couple of years, we’ve seen Microsoft invest more in more affordable laptops including the

The post Surface Laptop Go 2: Price, release date, and everything we expect appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft's budget laptop is due for a refresh soon, and we've rounded up everything we expect from a Surface Laptop Go 2.
